arabic.title: اهو ده اللى صار
text: و خير بلادنا مهوش في ايدنا
و بدال ما يشمت فينا حاسد
و بدال ما يشمت فينا حاسد

english.title: This is What Happened
text: And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
How can you blame me, oh our master
when the riches of our country are not even in our hands?
How can you blame me, oh our master
when the riches of our country are not even in our hands?
Speak of things that would benefit us
and then come back to blaming me
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
Take good care of [your] beloved ones
They are the supports of the cause
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
And instead of allowing an envious hater to be happy at our expense,
and get up and let's fight
And instead of allowing an envious hater to be happy at our expense,
and get up and let's fight
then we would all become one hand
And the hands would become strong
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was; You have no right
You have no right to blame me

arabic.title: ضحكة المساجين
text: مهما إجتهد ما هيعرف إنت مين
يا شموس بتبرق في غرف عتمين
م الهيبه حاطينه في قفص تاني
يا دي الميزان إللي طلعت لفوق
دول مش بتوع الصدق في الموازين
يرقص ما بين شهدا وبين محابيس
مافضلش غير الشوك في شجر الورد
غلط الربيع ودخل في أغبى كمين
الصوت في صمته أعلى من صوتي

english.title: The laugh of the prisoners
text: The sparrows flirt with its prison bars
A prison cell which hates its jailers
Taste with us the sweetness of the prison cells.
The sparrows flirt with its prison bars
A prison cell which hates its jailers
Taste with us the sweetness of the prison cells.
On its porch stretch your legs
Your jailer that is bewildered by your character,
no matter how hard he tries, won't know who you are.
Glad tidings to the one falsely imprisoned
in a time that tricks us and wrongs us.
O the suns which glimmer in these dimmed rooms!
As for the one who betrayed your people and my country,
out of terror they've placed him in a different cage.
He awakes and sleeps whilst everyone is standing.
And Egypt knows and sees and stays patient,
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
and takes back (its) name & all the titles.
O balance (justice) which has gone up high,
they force you back down by force or by manners.
Those are not the people of truthfulness in the balances.
The revolution is a light and the one who extinguished it is filthy.
He dances amongst martyrs and amongst prisoners
And the squares are still drowned in blood.
Sadness has really become imprinted in our hearts,
There remain only the thorns in the flower tree.
The spring made a mistake and slipped into the worst ambush
And they wait for you to despair with time
Other than you whilst in his cage, they give him their salutations
As for you, their shoes are ready even before their palms.
And Egypt knows and sees and stays patient,
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
and takes back the names & titles.
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
and takes back the names & titles.
(Prison guard): Man! Just sit and have a cup of tea
Everything's carrying on as normal, and our people are forgetful
And all thanks goes to the screen and the newspapers
And if they bark then go and pronounce your judgements
and go restrain every mouth with a bridle,
and you won't find it difficult to go cook up some laws.
(Back to prisoner) = O Egypt, tread lightly when you're passing by.
(Your) voice in its silence is louder than my voice.
Before you is the prisoner who did not spend his night in sadness.
And the one who stands in front of the revolutionaries,
will not gain from it but humiliation and disgrace.
And all that will remain is the laugh of the prisoners
And Egypt knows and sees and stays patient,
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
And Egypt knows and sees and stays patient,
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
and takes back the name & titles.
And Egypt knows and sees and stays patient,
but within a blink of an eye it passes through,
and takes back the name & titles.
and takes back the name & titles.

english.title: You know
text: I enjoy your company as if you shared my blood
I'm at ease with you as if you're my mother
I feel like I'm seeing you for the first time
from the first moment of my life
and you're a tree with shade and running water
I enjoy your company as if you shared my blood
I'm at ease with you as if you're my mother
a great  happiness and the sound of music
As if we were lovers who met after being separated
Why am I suddenly waiting alone?
Why do I talk and tell you and complain?
I enjoy your company as if you shared my blood
I'm at ease with you as if you're my mother
when I'm with you I feel a world
and that the world doesn't have
I feel like we are alone
and the universe is a meadow

english.title: My Bride
text: I swear upon my father and his fists1
I swear upon my mother's soul and my brother's head
That she will never marry the water pourer.
Who will take part in the wedding ceremony
other than the liquorice juice sellers?
From the alley and to the house's hallway
She's a full moon among moons
How is she to live in ditches
Oh, you are a drumstick tree branch2
and is smaller than a buckthorn fruit3
And she must fulfill her promise
I am her destiny and her happiness
There is no groom or companion for you other than me

english.title: As Much as We Fell in Love
text: As much as we fell in love
will call for us once again
As long as our hearts are pure
The sea of love will be rich
will clear up in the future
Between a yes and a no
but if we have pure souls
we will get all that we wished for
the sadness of our loved ones
the sun of love will rise
Why don't we become a memory
Why don't we become a song
but if we have pure souls
we will get all that we wished for

arabic.title: لما الشتا يدق البيبان
text: لما المطر يغسل شوارعنا القديمة و الحارات
كل الليالي اللي في قمرها قلبي بات
كنا طفولة حب لسة فى أوله
رغم اننا شايفين طريقنا بينتهي، تتصوري؟
لا عمري هأقدر عالفراق ولا أنتي عمرك تقدري
و لسة زهرة حبنا بتطرح ميعاد
لكن بيغرق حلمنا فى بحر السكات
لما المطر يغسل شوارعنا القديمة و الحارات
كل الليالي اللي فى قمرها قلبي مات

english.title: When Winter Knocks the Doors
text: when the rain washes our old streets and the alleys,
I find myself coming to you with my smile on my lips
All the stray paths call my step
[and] all the nights that my heart stayed in
I haven't come to blame you for the past,
nor did I come to awaken the memories
We were a childhood of love at its beginning
We embraced longing with our hands and joined it
Autumn called us and the trees were wilted
You were cold and I was cold [too]
their heartbeats with passion and longing
The flutes sang the most beautiful meanings of love
I haven't come to blame you for the past,
nor did I come to awaken the memories
Although we can see our road ending, can you imagine?
I will never be able to bear our separation nor will you
My longing still calls you despite the separation
And the flower of our love blossoms into a meeting
But our dream drowns in the sea of silence
I haven't come to blame you for the past,
nor did I come to awaken the memories
when the rain washes our old streets and the alleys,
I find myself coming to you with my smile on my lips
All the stray paths call my step
[and] all the nights that my heart stayed in
I haven't come to blame you for the past,
nor did I come to awaken the memories
